summary: BaseIndexEntry is a lightweight representation of an index entry, containing only the essential four fields needed to describe changes to the index. It is compatible with full IndexEntry objects, allowing functions that operate on BaseIndexEntry to also accept complete entries for performance‑optimized numeric indexing.
business_intent: Enable efficient tracking and manipulation of index modifications by providing a minimal entry structure that can interoperate with full index entries, reducing overhead in change‑detection and serialization processes.
